description: The Sony PlayStation 5 is a next-gen gaming console with ultra-fast SSD, ray tracing, and 3D audio support. Perfect for immersive gaming experiences.
details: Features an AMD Zen 2 CPU, RDNA 2 GPU, and 825GB SSD. Includes DualSense wireless controller with haptic feedback and adaptive triggers. Supports 4K gaming and backward compatibility with PS4 games.

description: The Microsoft Xbox Series X delivers powerful performance with 12 teraflops of GPU power and quick resume functionality. Designed for serious gamers.
details: Features an AMD Zen 2 CPU, RDNA 2 GPU, and 1TB SSD. Supports 4K gaming at 120fps and ray tracing. Includes Xbox Wireless Controller and access to Xbox Game Pass Ultimate.

description: The Nintendo Switch OLED Model offers a vibrant 7-inch OLED screen, enhanced speakers, and 64GB storage. Perfect for both home and portable gaming.
details: Features a dockable design with HDMI output, detachable Joy-Con controllers, and online multiplayer support. Includes access to exclusive Nintendo games like Mario Kart and Zelda.

description: The Steam Deck is a handheld gaming PC with a custom AMD APU, 7-inch touchscreen, and access to the Steam library. Ideal for PC gamers on the go.
details: Features 16GB LPDDR5 RAM, 256GB NVMe SSD, and Windows/Linux compatibility. Includes gyroscopic controls and a built-in microSD card slot for expandable storage.

description: The PlayStation VR2 takes VR gaming to the next level with 4K HDR visuals, eye-tracking, and haptic feedback. Designed exclusively for PS5.
details: Features a 110-degree field of view, foveated rendering, and adaptive triggers. Includes a headset, controllers, and cables for seamless setup.

description: The Xbox Elite Wireless Controller Series 2 offers customizable buttons, adjustable tension thumbsticks, and up to 40 hours of battery life. Perfect for competitive gamers.
details: Features interchangeable paddles, hair-trigger locks, and textured grips. Includes a carrying case and charging dock for added convenience.

description: The DualSense Edge Wireless Controller for PS5 offers advanced customization options, including swappable stick caps and back buttons. Designed for professional gamers.
details: Features adjustable trigger stops, customizable profiles, and a braided USB-C cable. Includes a carrying case and thumbstick modules for precision control.

description: The Nintendo Switch Pro Controller offers ergonomic design and precise controls for extended gaming sessions. Compatible with all Switch models.
details: Features motion controls, HD rumble, and Amiibo support. Includes Bluetooth connectivity and up to 40 hours of battery life.

productName: SteelSeries Arctis Nova Pro Wireless Headset
description: The SteelSeries Arctis Nova Pro Wireless Headset delivers premium sound quality and comfort for long gaming sessions. Features dual wireless connectivity for maximum flexibility.
details: Includes active noise cancellation, AI-powered noise suppression, and 40mm drivers for immersive audio. Battery life extends up to 24 hours with the included base station.

description: The Razer Kraken V3 HyperSense Headset combines haptic feedback with THX Spatial Audio for an immersive gaming experience. Lightweight and comfortable for extended use.
details: Features 50mm TriForce drivers, active noise cancellation, and Chroma RGB lighting. Includes a retractable microphone and cooling gel-infused ear cushions.
